title: Ensure package manager repositories are configured
description: Systems need to have package manager repositories configured to ensure they receive the latest patches and updates.
rationale: If a system's package repositories are misconfigured important patches may not be identified or a rogue repository could introduce compromised software.
remediation: Configure your package manager repositories according to site policy.

cis_controls_v8.title: Perform Automated Operating System Patch Management
cis_controls_v8.description: Perform operating system updates on enterprise assets through automated patch management on a monthly, or more frequent, basis.

cis_controls_v8.title: Perform Automated Application Patch Management
cis_controls_v8.description: Perform application updates on enterprise assets through automated patch management on a monthly, or more frequent, basis.

cis_controls_v7.title: Deploy Automated Operating System Patch Management Tools
cis_controls_v7.description: Deploy automated software update tools in order to ensure that the operating systems are running the most recent security updates provided by the software vendor.

cis_controls_v7.title: Deploy Automated Software Patch Management Tools
cis_controls_v7.description: Deploy automated software update tools in order to ensure that third-party software on all systems is running the most recent security updates provided by the software vendor.

notes: This is a manual control that requires verification against organizational security policy
Ensure that security update repositories are enabled and properly configured
Review repositories regularly to identify any unauthorized additions
